description:
Free All-in-One video and audio converter


- Update of ffmpeg
- Flac Codec: Added "Frame size" options
- Flac Codec: Added "LPC coefficient precision" options
- Flac Codec: Added "LPC algorithm" options
- Flac Codec: Added "Minimum partition order" options
- Flac Codec: Added "Maximum partition order" options
- Flac Codec: Added "Prediction order method" options

Troubleshooting
- Fixed minor bugs
